Name: Escape from the Lostmoon
About the game: Cosmic pilot has lost his ship on the remote asteroid Lostmoon, populated by disaster human colony. Hungry flesh eating zombies, villainous mercenaries and monsters are everywhere. Chased by hostile creatures he keeps trying to escape. Only you ... and his awesome arsenal could help on the risky way! Features: 6 extended level zones various ammunition different combat tactics traps and aggressive environment allied and hostile characters much more! If you like old-school platformers and slashers, thats your game Disclaimer: Author doesn’t consider available game build as the last final version. User responses and reviews are welcome and taking into account. Version 1.024 update description Dear all! Update to version 1.024 adds ladders to this game and fixes some minor bugs. In order to let hero climb onto these ladders new button was added to the control set. It is “UP” by default, however, could be changed in the “Settings” menu. Version 1.023 Update description Significant graphic and performance updates. Version 1.022 Update description Heroe appearance was slightly changed. Opportunity of rapid run was added. Version 1.021 Update description: Minor changes, fixing of usability. Version 1.02 Update description: Disaster cosmic pilot will encounter with HUGE troubles in our tremendous update! Changes include update in the game content and UI. New features: New mercenary enemies including rocket launcher SPG, jet pack soldiers and Minigun Boss (as well as the secret Crazy Boss in his hideout; Alien enemy - meet Wormy and his acid spits! Now you can save hostages and turn them into the allies; More blood and gore; Entirely new level - “Chemical factory”; New kind of objects - toxic chemicals, which cause poisoning of game characters; Several quest objects and interactions were added. Gameplay update: protagonist’s electric sword can now be discharged when fighting, making player seek for the other ways to survive until it charged. UI updates: you can now start playing from the any previously opened chapter; pressing of the Escape button in the middle of the level now lets you restart level or return to the main menu.
